content.text: Hi! I'm a writer. I started collaborating with some popular publishers. How about you?
Hi! I'm a teacher. I procrastinate on my lesson plans. What kind of writing do you do?
I write a lot of romance novels and thrillers. I've recently been getting into historical fiction.
That's really cool! I wish I could write. I'm really bad at it.
Everyone can write! You just have to keep practicing.
I guess you're right. I've been meaning to start writing a horror novel.
That would be awesome! I love horror movies.
Me too! But I've kept my love of horror movies from my parents.
They think they're too scary for me.
I guess they are pretty scary. But they're also a lot of fun.
I know. I love the adrenaline rush I get from watching them.
Me too! I'm glad we agree on something.
Me too! I'm also glad I met you. You seem like a really nice person.
